title: Geochemical and mineralogical characteristics of shales from the early to middle Permian Dohol Formation in Peninsular Malaysia: Implications for organic matter enrichment, provenance, tectonic setting, palaeoweathering and paleoclimate
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Alidu Rashid, Numair Ahmed Siddiqui, Nisar Ahmed, Ali Wahid, Muhammad Jamil, Abdul Aziz Sankoh, John Oluwadamilola Olutoki
